title: That grasp change on the pbe is stupid
body:
Making it do more damage and heal for 1% less ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

This mastery was mainly made for sustaining esp when you're weak early. This will only make snowbally tanks with built in heals worse.

replies.body: It deals the same damage as before.  The only change is that the healing is halved.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kTOV3oQg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-07T01:19:58.960+0000)
>
> It deals the same damage as before.  The only change is that the healing is halved.

No it got tweaked a bit again. It now does 3% max hp and heals for 1.5% instead of the previous change that made it be 2.5% / 1.25%
